MediaKeySystemAccess.summary: The MediaKeySystemAccess interface of the Encrypted Media Extensions API provides access to a Key System for decryption and/or a content protection provider. You can request an instance of this object using the method.

MediaKeySystemAccessCreateMediaKeys.summary:
The MediaKeySystemAccess.createMediaKeys() method returns a
{{jsxref('Promise')}} that resolves to a new object.

MediaKeySystemAccessGetConfiguration.summary: The getConfiguration() method of the interface returns an object with the supported combination of the following configuration options:

MediaKeySystemAccessKeySystem.summary: The keySystem read-only property of the interface returns a string identifying the key system being used.

remarks.para: This is the value that was passed to when system access is requested.
